DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : JAPAN
DOC.TEXT: Toyota Lowers Domestic Sales Projection : The president of Toyota Motor Corp . said 100 # 000 fewer vehicles will be sold in Japan this year than the big car_maker had previously estimated . Sales will total 5 million units in 1994 , down from the company ' s earlier estimate of 5.1 million , Tatsuro Toyoda told reporters , according to the Nikkei English News .
